Explanation:
GFAP, CD11b, TNF-alpha, ROS, and nitrite are all chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph. GFAP and CD11b are proteins, TNF-alpha is a cytokine, ROS refers to Reactive Oxygen Species which are a group of reactive molecules, and nitrite is a chemical compound.
